page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
EMPLOYMENT STANTON HARCOURT The primary employment is in farming, followed by jobs in the gravel extraction industry and some in local haulage industry based in village. Some villagers commute to Oxford, and others to London and elsewhere.
Types of employment of villagers:
Gardeners * Policemen Farm labourers * Shop workers * Farmers * Car Assembly work School teachers * Haulage drivers * College/university Publicans * lecturers Forester Sales Representative Secretaries * Company directors Technicians Hospital porter Nurses Solicitors Designers Silversmith * Carpenter * Some of those with * work in village
